content: claude chick the amigurumi pattern designed by cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2025 my full pattern collection is available on ravelry select patterns available on etsy lovecrafts hobbii and amigurumi com find me on instagram @carascreationsaus and use #carascreationsaus to share your finished toy about the pattern the pattern is an easy level and uses us terms a knowledge of how to crochet is essential as it does not teach you how to crochet it simply provides instructions to make the toy this pattern is for your own use you may not sell copy alter or re-distribute the pattern without permission you may sell toys made using this pattern i really hope that you enjoy making claude thanks so much for your support important info materials abbreviations  3 50mm hook/e us  chain = chain  10ply yarn worsted / aran > less than  magic_ring = magic_ring 50g in all colours  single_crochet = single_crochet  orange embroidery thread  double_crochet = double_crochet  a pair of 9mm safety eyes  increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in  scissors one stitch  tapestry needle  decrease = single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2  polyester toy stuffing together  stitch marker optional  slip_stitch = slip_stitch  = repeat the space in brackets the given number of times  = total number of stitches notes  amigurumi is usually worked in the round and a yarn with no stretch is best  when changing colour pull through the new colour on the stitch before you need it this will ensure that you have the correct colour yarn on the hook for the upcoming stitch  generally the hook you use for amigurumi will be a smaller as you want the stitches tight  your gauge yarn thickness and hook size used will affect the size of your finished item my claude is approx 12cm tall  i ve used hobbii friends cotton 8/8 in the following yarns o yellow = colour 21 pastel yellow o red = colour 40 tomato o blue = colour 77 arctic blue o hot pink =
